bill_title: to establish certain prima facie evidence that an account holder executed a check.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain prima facie evidence that an account holder executed a check. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 22-41 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If a check bears the name and address of an account holder and bears the signature of the account holder, that is prima facie evidence that the account holder executed the check. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain prima facie evidence that an account holder executed a check. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 22-41 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The passing of a check, that bears the name and address of an account holder and bears a signature, purporting to be that of the account holder, is prima facie evidence that an account holder executed the check. BILL HISTORY 1/16/98 First read in House and referred to Judiciary. H.J. 58 1/26/98 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/26/98 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 0. H.J. 210

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain prima facie evidence that an account holder executed a check. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 22-41 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The passing of a check, that bears the name and address of an account holder and bears a signature, purporting to be that of the account holder, is prima facie evidence that an account holder executed the check. BILL HISTORY 1/16/98 First read in House and referred to Judiciary. H.J. 58 1/26/98 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/26/98 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 0. H.J. 210 1/28/98 Motion to Amend, Passed. H.J. 281 1/28/98 Motion to Amend, Passed. H.J. 282 1/28/98 House of Representatives Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 54, NAYS 10. H.J. 282

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain prima facie evidence that an account holder executed a check. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 22-41 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The passing of a check, described in § 22-41-1, that bears the name and address of an account holder and bears a signature, purporting to be that of the account holder, is prima facie evidence that an account holder executed the check. BILL HISTORY 1/16/98 First read in House and referred to Judiciary. H.J. 58 1/26/98 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/26/98 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 0. H.J. 210 1/28/98 Motion to Amend, Passed. H.J. 281 1/28/98 Motion to Amend, Passed. H.J. 282 1/28/98 House of Representatives Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 54, NAYS 10. H.J. 282 1/29/98 First read in Senate and referred to Judiciary. S.J. 249 2/11/98 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/11/98 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 7, NAYS 0. 2/11/98 Judiciary Place on Consent Calendar.
